title: Medical Practical Skills Enhancement: Gamification-Based Science Project Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific theory and experience in practical application
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners complete a PBL project applying gamification elements to solve science problems with over 80% completion.
Learners achieve a collaboration rate of over 75% with peers using mobile-based gamification tools (e.g., quiz battles, mission achievement systems).
Learners explain in three or more steps the process of analyzing data collected in a gamified environment to derive scientific conclusions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
